name: Smoliverse
description:
Smoliverse is a smol game I made for a game jam. This is a bullet hell game with lots of lasers, lightning, and explosions. Move with WASD or arrows.  This game does not have an ending, it is endless. Though, I am making a full version (probably) where there COULD be an ending. (Also, don't try to no-hit it. You can't.)

This is my first Scratch-turned-HTML project. I know there are some issues, but I will figure those out later. After all, it's a game jam. I'm supposed to be trying new things.

If you like this game, please sub to my youtube channel.  ImSideen in the search bar. Please.
